name: acrolinx-sidebar-startpage
description: A Container Component for Acrolinx Integrations that loads the Acrolinx sidebar

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -r 'npm run lessWatch' 'npm run tscWatch' 'npm run watchify' 'npm run browsersync'
scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp tmp/dist s3://acrolinx-sidebar-classic/v14/dev --recursive --acl public-read
scripts.deployProd: aws s3 cp tmp/dist s3://acrolinx-sidebar-classic/v14/prod --recursive --acl public-read
scripts.test: npm run testNodeJS && npm run testKarmaPhantomJS
scripts.clean: rm -rf tmp && rm -rf app/scripts && rm -rf dist
scripts.buildDist: rm -rf tmp/dist && mkdir -p app/scripts && npm run generateTranslationsTs && npm run tslint && tsc && npm run injectVersion && npm run test && npm run browserify && npm run less && mkdir -p tmp && cp -r app tmp/dist && hashcat tmp/dist/index.html &&  npm run buildOfflineDist && npm run buildInlined && npm run fakeSidebarDist && npm run buildNpmDist
scripts.buildNpmDist: mkdir -p dist && cp -R tmp/dist-offline/ dist && rm dist/dist-offline/index-inlined.html && npm run createNpmDistFilesIndex
scripts.buildOfflineDist: rm -rf tmp/dist-offline && cp -r app tmp/dist-offline && npm run inlineSvg ./tmp/dist-offline/styles
scripts.buildInlined: rm -rf tmp/dist-inlined && cp -r app tmp/dist-inlined && hashcat tmp/dist-inlined/index-inlined.html && npm run inline && npm run packInlined
scripts.inline: npm run inlineSvg ./tmp/dist-inlined/styles && cd tmp/dist-inlined && cat index-inlined.html |inliner >../dist-inlined.html
scripts.fakeSidebarDist: npm run bower && cat bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js bower_components/lodash/dist/lodash.min.js > tmp/dist/scripts/libs.js && cp tmp/dist/scripts/main.js tmp/dist/scripts/sidebar.js

author: Acrolinx
